description_tnc.message: By installing and using this extension, you agree to the following terms:

terms_content.message:
1. Permitted Use

This extension has been developed for personal use to assist sellers in their administrative management, locally in their browser.
Any commercial use is prohibited without express written permission from the author.

2. Privacy and Personal Data
  • This extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal or sensitive data outside the user's device.
  • All information entered or processed using the extension remains on the user's device.
  • Any type of leakage of information will be the direct responsibility of the person who uses it or has modified it.
3. Updates
  • The extension can consult an official source to see if a new version exists.
  • This process does not transmit personal data, it only compares the installed version.
4. User Responsibility
  • The user assumes full responsibility for the use of this extension.
  • The author will not be responsible for failures, errors, loss of information, or for direct or indirect damages arising from its use.
5. Unauthorized Modifications

If If a modified extension is detected for commercial purposes, the author reserves the right to take legal or technical action to revoke its use.

If you do not agree to these terms, do not use this extension.

cb_accept_terms.message: I accept the terms and conditions of service
